Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people communicating over a distance using a string telephone.
The student can illustrate that the string telephone uses sound to transfer information from one person to another.
The student can label the parts of the string telephone, including the cups and string.
The student can demonstrate, through the drawing, that the string is pulled tight between the two cups to effectively transmit sound.
The student can explain in simple terms how their drawing shows a way people communicate over long distances.
The student can use the provided materials in the drawing to show how the device is built for effective communication.
The student can include labels or short descriptions to clarify how their drawing meets the communication goal.
